issue.title: [CF 599] Target of unitID
issue.body:
Hello,

I am trying to make something similar to Gladius` TargetBar, showing the target (class icon) of arena1-3 (or any other unitID such as party1-3). What I have tried to do:
Make a condition icon, using the condition "Unit Class". However there is no unitID for target of a specific unitID. So basically my question is: is there a way to have a condition for a certain unitID`s target?

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
v6.0.2

Thanks in advance,


> Posted by CurseForge user daniel1992 | Imported from CurseForge issue #599 | Raw

comments.body:
arena1target will work just fine. I can't possibly list every single possible unitID, because there is technically an infinite amount, so only the most common are listed.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
